siteMetadata.title: Shilpi Agrawal
siteMetadata.subtitle: Blog of poems, experiences, product management, personal opinions

frontmatter.title: Confirmation Bias (Stories We Tell Ourselves Matter)
frontmatter.description: “The only thing standing between you and your goal is the bullshit story you keep telling yourself as to why you can't achieve it.” ― Jordan Belfort. Confirmation bias is like a swamp you don't realise you're in. Confirmation bias is everywhere, we're just too blind to see it. Once we see it, we're too stuck in the swamp to be able to pull ourselves out.
